channel.title: Really weird Skill cape error! please help
channel.description:
allright well im using hippiescape as my source for coding, and Galkons Anarchy for my client.
Heres the weird error->
u get skillcapes by achieving a 135 stat. u get the cape by going to the mage training arena and standing in the middle of the 4 portals. But, instead of getting a cape you get somthing totally different. it looks like a seed and says yu.....0..'..@..Dwarf remains null.
I have no idea what to do! but the error was there when i got the source i think. Idk can any1 help me?

item.title: Really weird Skill cape error! please help
item.dc:creator: @agent_nukks agent nukks
item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

You have to add the skillCapes to your client. The reason of the null being there is stating that the client can’t read it, you need RSMV (RuneScape model viewer, and a GZipper. Galkon has a tutorial for you to follow. Here is teh link.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,262499.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Really weird Skill cape error! please help

item.title: Really weird Skill cape error! please help

item.description:

make your server a zip file, then look in theiving handler.
